255303.「私は ガテリア号に乗って\n 海底探索を まだまだ続けていこうと思う。\n 時:
I'll continue exploring the ocean with the
Gateria. If you ever have the time, I'd really
appreciate the help!
<end>

255304.「いいぞー！\n ガテリア号に乗りこんで\n 海底探索へ 出発するのだな？\n<:
Great! You ready to go exploring with the
Gateria?
<yesno><break>

255305.「ときは来た！\n さあ 海底探索に出発だ！\n<end>:
The time has come! The bottom of the ocean
awaits!<end>

255306.「え やめるのか……？ うそだろ……？\n ほんとうに やめちゃうのか……？\n:
What... you changed your mind...? Really...?
That's really too bad... I hope you'll change
your mind and come back...
<end>

255307.「ときが来たら ガテリア号に乗って\n また海底探索に 行こうと思う。\n その:
When the time comes, we'll board the Gateria
and go exploring the ocean floor again. I'll
need your help then!
<end>

255308.「今回の海底探索は もう充分にできた。\n また次の機会に 協力を よろしく頼む:
I've had enough of this underwater
exploration. Next time, we'll need your help!<bw_break>

255309.「むむ？\n お前は パーティリーダーでは ないな。\n<br>\n「パーティリ:
Hmm? You're not the party leader.
Tell them to come talk to me.
<bw_break>

255310.「報酬を 見るのだな？\n<select_se_off>\nトータルスコア報酬\:
You want to see the rewards?
<select_se_off>
Total Score Rewards
<select_end><break>

255312.「これまでに 獲得した ポイントの合計で\n これらの報酬を プレゼントするぞ！:
You'll receive these rewards based on the
total points you've earned so far!<break>

255313.「むむ？ まだ ランキングが無いようだ。\n<bw_break>:
Hmm? Doesn't seem like there's any rankings
yet.
<bw_break>

<select_se_off>
About Submarine Parts
About Energy Gauge
About Skills

255316.「みなで協力して 船体の修理に必要な\n パーツを集める。時間内に全てのパーツを:
Everyone will work together to repair the hull. If we succeed, we'll move onto the next stage of repair.
The next step is to repair the engine. Make sure to deliver all of the parts needed within the time limit.
When both of those are fixed, it's time to load the Gateria up with treasure!
You can bring the treasure to either a storage zone or the ship itself. It's up to you!
You can get back onto the Gateria by using the ladder. Don't take too much time with the treasure though, you could miss the trip back!

255317.「ガテリア号の 修理に必要なパーツは\n ねじ 電池 歯車の 三種類。\n これ:
The parts needed to repair the Gateria are screws, batteries, and gears. I'd like them to be collected and delivered.
Each part has a specific storage zone it needs to be delivered to.
You can tell which part you're responsible for by the icon above your head. You can't collect the other types of parts.
However, if you collect all the parts you're responsible for, you can start collecting the other types too!
The crewmembers in white suits cannot collect any parts.
Instead, they run faster than normal, and use Cheer to give energy to those who need it.
They can also use Cheer on a fallen crewmate who's been bitten by an Abyssal Shark! This will allow them to move again immediately!

255318.「次に 注意事項を伝える。 海底には\n 恐ろしい生き物が たくさんいる……。\:
Next, a word of caution. There are many terrible creatures at the bottom of the ocean... the one you need to watch out for the
most is the Abyssal Shark! If it bites you, you will be blown to the vicinity of the Gateria, and you will lose all the parts you
were carrying to the place where it bit you! You'll have to wait a bit before you can move, as it will destroy your diver suit, and you'll
also have to watch out for the Man o' War. If you touch it, you'll be paralyzed for a while and your parts will be swept away. Both of
these will turn yellow to warn you if you are near them, so be aware of your surroundings! You can also use the stun zone to scare them
away!

255319.「ダイバースーツの スキルについて\n 説明するぞ。\n<br>\n「ひとつめは:
Diver suit skills, explained... The first is... You can use it on a fallen comrade. If you use it on a fallen comrade, it can even
wake them up, making it a powerful skill that can be used over and over again! However... But you can't ale yourself, and you can't ale
yourself if you have parts. You'll have to think very carefully about whether or not you want to get the parts. Secondly, Stun... The
second is a stun... which creates a powerful electrical current around you... to ward off dangerous creatures. Unfortunately, as
powerful as the effect is, it only fires one shot per stun shell. Use it when the time is right! Picking up more than one stun shell
won't increase the number of times you can use it, so it's best to leave some for your friends.

255320.「協力してくれたお礼として\n 私から トータルスコアに応じた\n 報酬をわたそ:
As a thank you for your help, I'll give you a reward based on your total score! To see what you'll get, go to "View Rewards"... I hope
you'll try your best to complete it!

255321.「フレンドとチームメンバーの\n ハイスコアの ランキングを\n 見ることができ:
You can see the high score rankings of your
friends and team members... Try as many times
as you can to get a higher score!<bw_break>

255322.「おお！ よくがんばってくれた！\n 報酬を渡すぞ！\n<bw_break>:
Oh! You've done well! I'll give you a
reward!<bw_break>

255324.「<%'nM_POINT>ポイントの報酬\n <%sM_ITEM>を 渡すぞ！\:
I'll give you this <%sM_ITEM>
for earning <%'dM_POINT> points!
<end>

<end>

255326.「むむ？ <%sM_BAG_TYPE>が いっぱいだな。\n 空きを つくってか:
Mmm? Your <%sM_BAG_TYPE> is full.
Come back when you've made some room.
<end>

255329.「渡せる報酬は 以上だ。\n また よろしく頼む！\n<end>:
That's all I have to give you. Thanks again!
<end>

and go exploring the ocean floor again. I'll

<end>

257048.規定のプレイ評価に\n満たなかったので\nスコアは０ポイントとなります。\n<s:
Since you did not meet the required play
rating, you will earn 0 points.
<se_nots System 7>

276744.「ダイバースーツには エナジーがある。\n エナジーゲージで 残りが確認できる。:
The diver's suit has an energy gauge... An energy gauge will tell you how much energy you have left. As you turn over parts, your
energy level will decrease. When it reaches zero, your diver suit will pause and you'll be stuck in there until it restarts.

276745.「海底には 様々なアイテムが\n 流れてくることがあるぞ。\n<br>\n「まず:
There are a variety of Items that can be found at the bottom of the ocean. First, there are Stun Bullets, which enable the use of Stun
Zones. Next is the Survival Box, which increases everyone's movement speed and restores all energy, and finally, the Score
Jewel, which increases the voyage's score. Don't miss them if you find them!

<end>
